message.content:
cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of adaptive stabilization of linear systems, which is a fundamental problem in control theory and falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). The use of random linear feedbacks and the introduction of new concepts and technical tools suggest a machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) perspective. The focus on finite time stabilization and the use of probabilistic guarantees suggest a neural networks (cs.NE) and robotics (cs.RO) perspective.
